description: The shortest sock in their Cool-Lite Series, the Quarter has breathable mesh panels and Ultimax® moisture control.
name: Cool-Lite Hiker Quarter Socks

specs.value: 48% Polyester, 23% X2O® Acrylic, 21% Stretch Nylon, 7% Tencel®, 1% Spandex
Zone Cushion - Comfort and shock absorption is knit into targeted areas, typically the heel and toe
Midweight - Dense cushion in multiple areas of the sock such as shin, sole or the entire foot of the sock
Hiking, Everyday, Athletic, Hunting & Fishing, Work
